comment: Obsolete version of ~ n2dvds1 as of 3-May-2023. 2 does not divide 1. That means 1 is odd. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 8-Dec-2018.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
